metaTitle: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO Santa Pola | 2-Bed Apartments from €245,000
metaDescription: Discover RESIDENCIAL EL FARO in Santa Pola, Alicante. Modern 2-bedroom apartments from €245,000. Delivery 2028. International community, beaches & golf nearby.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to RESIDENCIAL EL FARO, an exciting new residential development in Torre Pacheco, Santa Pola, crafted by the trusted developer PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. This contemporary project offers 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments starting from €245,000, designed for families and investors seeking quality Mediterranean living. With delivery scheduled for September 1st, 2028, these modern homes combine smart construction standards with thoughtful community amenities. RESIDENCIAL EL FARO represents exceptional value in the Costa Blanca market, positioned 40% below Spanish island property prices while offering access to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and an established international community where English is widely spoken. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic coastal regions, RESIDENCIAL EL FARO delivers lifestyle, location, and long-term value appreciation potential.

locationSection.intro: Torre Pacheco, nestled in Santa Pola, Alicante, is a thriving Mediterranean destination attracting discerning buyers from across Europe. This strategically positioned town offers the perfect balance of coastal living and convenient urban access, with a cosmopolitan atmosphere enhanced by its substantial international population. Santa Pola is renowned for its stunning Blue Flag beaches, world-class golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities serving both locals and expatriates. The region has experienced consistent property value growth of 8% year-on-year, making it an increasingly attractive investment destination. Infrastructure is excellent with reliable transport connections, modern shopping facilities, and authentic Spanish dining experiences. The area's established expatriate community ensures English is commonly spoken, creating a welcoming environment for international residents seeking to establish roots on the Costa Blanca.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including prestigious clubs
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional Spanish tapas to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO apartments are constructed to the highest standards by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, featuring premium materials and contemporary design throughout. Each 75m² unit showcases efficient floor plans maximizing natural light and living space. Modern construction techniques include thermal break double glazing, air conditioning pre-installation, and quality ceramic flooring. The developer provides a 10-year structural warranty, ensuring long-term peace of mind. Every detail reflects attention to quality and sustainability, from fitted kitchens with modern appliances to contemporary bathroom fixtures. Community spaces are thoughtfully designed to foster resident connection while maintaining privacy and tranquility.

content.investmentSection: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic coastal markets. Santa Pola property values demonstrate consistent growth of 8% year-on-year, outpacing broader Spanish market trends. At €245,000 for quality 2-bedroom apartments, RESIDENCIAL EL FARO offers exceptional value—approximately 40% less expensive than comparable properties in Spanish island markets. The rental market strengthens the investment case, with similar properties commanding €800 per week during holiday seasons. The established international community and strong tourism infrastructure support both rental demand and price appreciation. As new infrastructure projects continue enhancing regional connectivity and amenities, RESIDENCIAL EL FARO's Torre Pacheco location is positioned to benefit from long-term capital appreciation while generating consistent rental income for property investors.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in Torre Pacheco with easy access to Alicante
Trusted developer PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE with established reputation
Exceptional value—40% less than Spanish island property markets
Modern construction with 10-year structural warranty included
Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes driving distance
Several championship golf courses nearby for enthusiasts

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in RESIDENCIAL EL FARO?
faqs.answer: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO apartments start from €245,000. Each unit features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with 75m² of built area. Currently 2 units are available. Contact us for detailed pricing and payment plan options.

faqs.question: When will RESIDENCIAL EL FARO be completed?
faqs.answer: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO delivery is scheduled for September 1st, 2028. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific completion dates and phased delivery schedules are available upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of RESIDENCIAL EL FARO?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE is the developer, an established firm with proven expertise building quality residential developments throughout Santa Pola and the Costa Blanca region. They maintain high construction standards and provide comprehensive buyer support.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca is an excellent property investment destination. The region shows consistent 8% year-on-year property appreciation, hosts an established international community where English is widely spoken, and offers outstanding amenities including healthcare within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches, and championship golf courses. Strong rental demand and tourism support long-term value growth.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without requiring Spanish residency or a visa for the purchase itself. EU and non-EU citizens have equal rights to property ownership. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE can guide you through the legal process and recommend qualified legal advisors specializing in international property purchases.

faqs.question: How far is RESIDENCIAL EL FARO from the beach?
faqs.answer: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO is approximately 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches. Santa Pola's pristine Mediterranean coastline is easily accessible by car, making beach lifestyle a daily reality for residents. The area features several award-winning beaches with excellent facilities and water sports opportunities.

faqs.question: What amenities are near RESIDENCIAL EL FARO?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for daily shopping, regional hospital within 30 minutes plus private clinics, several championship golf courses, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, international schools with British curriculum options, and diverse restaurants offering Spanish and international cuisine.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Spanish property purchase costs typically include: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (1-2%), registration fees (0.5-1%), and legal fees (1-2% of property price). RESIDENCIAL EL FARO pricing at €245,000 means total acquisition costs approximately €20,000-30,000. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE recommends consulting with a Spanish tax advisor for personalized cost estimates.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property taxes in Spain (IBI) typically range from 0.4% to 1.1% of the cadastral property value, varying by municipality. Rental income from investment properties is taxed at standard income tax rates (19-45% depending on total income). Non-resident property owners may face additional wealth tax. Consult with a Spanish tax professional for your specific situation regarding RESIDENCIAL EL FARO.

content.conclusion: RESIDENCIAL EL FARO represents your gateway to Mediterranean living on the Costa Blanca. Developed by the trusted PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, these modern 2-bedroom apartments combine exceptional value, strategic location, and quality construction. From September 2028, you could be enjoying daily beach access, championship golf courses, and vibrant international community life in Torre Pacheco. With property values appreciating 8% annually and strong rental income potential, RESIDENCIAL EL FARO offers both lifestyle and investment benefits. Limited availability at €245,000 makes early inquiry essential. Contact us today via WhatsApp to explore floor plans, discuss financing options, and secure your place in this exciting Costa Blanca development. Your dream Mediterranean property awaits.
